data.oai_dc:dc: It contains the data of relative expression for SFP genes in Exp. 1. r.ID: randomly assigned sample identity to mask the true identity of each sample during qPCR. Treatment: assigned treatment for each replicate (isolated, paired or iso-paired). log(2dct_Lhis): relative expression of SFP genes, normalized by a house-keeping gene (Lhis).
